cheatsheet.title: Moving from a model to another

intro.description: It is very easy to navigate from a model to another !

item.title: Navigating thru models
item.description:
Double click the PetClinicSharedState.json file to open it in the editor.
Right click the editor and select the Layout -> Tree Layout menu item.
Reorganize the vertices and edges so that the graph looks like nice.
Save your work.
Select the v_Veterinarians vertex.
In the right corner , you can see an icon , click on it to open the shared model.
The VeterinariensSharedState.json is opened in an editor.
Reorganize the vertices and edges so that the graph looks like nice.
Save your work.
Select the v_Veterinarians vertex.
In the right corner , you can see an icon , click on it to open the shared model.
You switched back to the previous graph, with the shared node selected !
